extends java.lang.Object

    Abstract Class Account

    Class to hold accounts

      • accountType

        protected Account.AccountType accountType

      • balance

        protected double balance

      • userIDs

        protected java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> userIDs
        Users are be able to share accounts, in other words, each account can have more than one userID affiliated with it. Hence we need an arrayList to hold multiple IDs. The user who creates the account will always be at index zero in the array.
